english.segment1: I'm reaching out without a sound. My pride falls to the floor again. Inside my mind I search to find. A place just to call my own
english.segment2: Deep inside your eyes. I am blinded by your love. Still I run so far just to find that. I'm alone again
english.segment3: In my head. I hear you calling me. And I can't run cause there's nothing left for me. When I fall you always follow me deep inside. Deep inside. Deep inside of my head
english.segment4: I just can't last as these feelings pass. Once again I hide the pain inside. The smile wears thin and the lies begin. To bring me down again
english.segment5: When I run I run so far away from you. I hide the pain and all the lies deep inside again. And all my faith I put in you. This time you take it all away
english.segment6: Inside my head Deep inside My head
